reviews.review: It's hard to say how bad this game is, bullets never register even though u put so much time to practice, i shoot on his head but he doesnt die? every time i use a flashbang the enemy is never flashbanged? 1/10 game fuck this shit
game good. me wingman pro. my friends love it. no toxic. no bad people. have fun in it

just kidding..don't buy this game. EVER! Why are we paying for prime upgrade? So many cheaters in this shitty game and you have to win 15 games to rank up once.. this game lacks of logic. I repeat..don't buy this shit game
